page.title: 02BASIC STATISTICS
page.content: We delivered 149 questionnaires to all the known houses in the D-block;118 were returned. 320 people lived in these 118 houses 19 lived alone : 52 homes had 2 occupants; 12 had 3;20 had 4;9 had 5;and 6 had 6 occupants. The population can be categorised as: Under 16 - 54 : 16+ Students - 12 Housewives - 49: Retired - 110 Unemployed - 6: Employed_89. The categorisations of Housewives and Retired caused confusion.37 retired people were also seen as housewives. 13 families had always lived in their present home, whilst 48 had moved locally. The remainder had come from the South East (28),South West (13) North West (4), North East (2), Midlands (2), Scotland (1),abroad (7) <CONT/>
